name: Finn Holland
bio: Cloud Engineer who enjoys spending my spare time researching new technologies - trying my best to implement them, or hiking.
shortBio: I make things go up and down
about: My journey in software could be traced all the way back to the early yet humble days of Minecraft modding. The limitless possibilities in the world of software were right in front of my eyes. Come to today and after two years in the industry I've had the pleasure of working across industries such as employee management, healthcare services, and pharmaceuticals.
